Pre-Game Insights: The St. Louis Cardinals and Milwaukee Brewers are set to meet on September 3, 2024.
The line for the game is Milwaukee Brewers -109 / St. Louis Cardinals -109, with an Over/Under of +7.5.
The St. Louis Cardinals are 69-69 on the year, while the Milwaukee Brewers are 81-57.
Milwaukee Brewers Betting Preview: The Milwaukee Brewers have scored 17 runs in their last 3 games and 4 or more runs in 7 of their last 8 games.
William Contreras leads the Milwaukee Brewers with 148 hits and 80 RBI, while Willy Adames and Jackson Chourio have combined for 255 hits and 166 RBI.
St. Louis Cardinals Betting Preview: The St. Louis Cardinals have scored 23 runs in their last 3 games and 4 or more runs in 6 of their last 8 games.
Masyn Winn leads the St. Louis Cardinals with 139 hits and 49 RBI, while Brendan Donovan and Nolan Arenado have combined for 270 hits and 124 RBI.
St. Louis Cardinals vs Milwaukee Brewers: Steven Matz gets the ball for the St. Louis Cardinals, and he is 1-2 with a 6.18 ERA and 17 strikeouts this season.
Aaron Civale gets the ball for the Milwaukee Brewers, and he is 5-8 with a 4.59 ERA and 127 strikeouts this season.

Milwaukee Brewers vs St. Louis Cardinals: The St. Louis Cardinals have nothing to play for at this stage, and they look like it more times than not.
Steven Matz doesn’t have the sample size to trust in a spot like this, and he’s been rough in limited innings.
Aaron Civale is coming off a decent month of August, so he’s starting to find his footing after some shaky performances.
Cheap price, I’m not sure how the Brewers aren’t the pick in this spot. Give me the Brewers in game 2 against the Cardinals.
